Jingpeng Hong


Welcome to my website!

My name is Jingpeng and I am a Master student in Economics at the University of Chicago.
In July 2021, I obtained my Bachelor's degree in Economics from the National School of Development, Peking University.

My research interests lie in quantitative marketing, empirical IO, especially in retailing, choice model and market structure. Feel free to look at my research to learn more!
